description.value:
Fires a liquid (such as poision) as a spray. Contains tiny resoviour that can contain any liquid and should be replaced after use. To use, make WS Test to fire poison up to a metre away, can't be parried but can be dodged. Creatures caught in spray must make test to resist poison if appropriate.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
